title: What I Do?
items: Developing AR & VR applications to simulate complex technological novel ideas.
Designing & Implementing features for passion game projects.
Building reusable tools to shorten development time for Unity.

title: Programming Languages
items: Developed a wide range of games and applications with Unity and C# for Windows & Mac.
Built applications using C++, focusing on OOP and efficient code practices.
Created an AR app for Apple Vision Pro utilizing Swift, enhancing user interaction with innovative software & hardware integration.

title: Video & Audio Editing
items: Engineered highly complex audio signal processing pipelines for custom hardware using Max 8, while ensuring precision and efficiency.
Edited moonshot demo videos with custom software and hardware, delivering high-impact visual presentations.
Experienced in video editing with Clipchamp and Capcut, producing high quality content.
